1.verse: Yoo! Uhleli wodwa, umzi obantu baye bebaninzi; Obe umkhulu ezintlangeni Usuke waba njengomhlolokazi; umthethelikazi emazweni Usuke waba ngofakwa uviko.

2.verse: Ulila elilile ebusuku, iinyembezi zakhe zisezidleleni zakhe;  Akanamthuthuzeli kuzo zonke izithandane zakhe; Onke amakholwane akhe ammenezelele, Aba lutshaba kuye.

3.verse: UYuda uye ekuthinjweni, ephuma ezintsizini nasezinkonzweni ezininzi; Yena uhleli ezintlangeni, akafumani kuphumla; Bonke abamsukelayo bamfikele ezingxingongweni.

4.verse: Iindlela zaseZiyon zenza isijwili, ngokungabikho kwabaya emithendelekweni; Onke amasango ayo akanamntu, ababingeleli bayo bayancwina; Iintombi zayo zinosizi, yona ke kukrakra kuyo.

5.verse: Ababandezeli bayo basuka bayintloko; iintshaba zayo zinobunqobo; Ngokuba uYehova uyenze yanosizi ngenxa yokreqo lwayo oluninzi; Abantwana bayo bemkile, bathinjiwe, baqhutywa ngumbandezeli.

6.verse: Buphumile entombini enguZiyon bonke ubungangamsha bayo;  Abathetheli bayo baba njengamaxhama angafumani dlelo, Ahamba engenamandla phambi komsukeli.

7.verse: IYerusalem iyazikhumbula, ngemini yeentsizi zayo neyokudinga kwayo, Zonke izinto zayo ezinqwenelekayo ebinazo kwakwiimini zamandulo, Ekuweni kwabantu bayo esandleni sombandezeli,  ingenamncedi; Ababandezeli bayo bayibona, bakuhleka ukucinywa kwayo.

8.verse: IYerusalem asikuko nokuba yonile yona; ngenxa yoko yaba lubhorha; Bonke ababeyizukisa bayayicukuceza, ngokuba babone ubuze bayo; Nayo ngokwayo iyancwina, ibuye umva.

9.verse: Ubunqambi bayo busezingutyeni zayo ezirhuqayo,  ayilikhumbulelanga ikamva layo; Yehla ke ngokubalulekileyo;  ayinamthuthuzeli; Ithi, Zikhangele, Yehova, iintsizi zam;  ngokuba utshaba luzikhulisile.

10.verse: Umbandezeli usolule isandla sakhe phezu kwezinto zayo zonke ezinqwenelekayo; Kuba ibona iintlanga zingene engcweleni yayo,  Owawuwise umthetho wena, ukuba zingangeni ebandleni lakho.

11.verse: Bonke abantu bayo bayancwina, befuna isonka; Barhole izinto zabo ezinqwenelekayo ngenxa yesonka, ukuze bawubuyise umphefumlo; Bona, Yehova, ukhangele, ukuba ndisuke ndacukucezeka.

12.verse: Akunto na oku kuni nonke, nina nidlula ngendlela? Bhekani nibone, ukuba kukho na umvandedwa onjengomvandedwa wam,  endiwenziweyo, Athe uYehova wandenza lusizi ngemini yokuvutha komsindo wakhe.

13.verse: Engaphezulu, uthume umlilo emathanjeni am, wawanyathela;  Uzanekele umnatha iinyawo zam, wandibuyisa umva; Undenze inxuwa, yonke imini ndityhafile.

14.verse: Idyokhwe yezikreqo zam ibotshwe sisandla sakhe;  Zibhijelene, zenyuka zaba semqaleni wam, zawakhubekisa amandla am; INkosi yam indinikele ezandleni zabo ndingenakumisa kubo.

15.verse: INkosi yam izitshitshisile zonke iimbalasane zam eziphakathi kwam; Indimemele umthendeleko, ukuba yaphule amadodana am. INkosi yam ixovule inkazana enguYuda, ngokungathi kusesixovulweni sewayini.

16.verse: Ngenxa yezo zinto ndiyalila; iliso lam, iliso lam lihla amanzi, Ngokuba ekude kum umthuthuzeli, umbuyisi womphefumlo wam; Baziimpanza abantwana bam, ngokuba utshaba lwam lundoyisile.

17.verse: IZiyon iyazolula izandla zayo, ayinamthuthuzeli; UYehova ubawisele umthetho ngoYakobhi, ukuba ababandezeli bakhe bamngqonge: IYerusalem iyinto elubhorha phakathi kwabo.

18.verse: Ulilungisa uYehova; ngokuba bendiphikise umlomo wakhe.  Khanive, nonke zizwe, niwubone umvandedwa wam; Umthinjana wam namadodana am emke nokuthinjwa.

19.verse: Ndibize izithandane zam, zandikhohlisa zona; Ababingeleli bam, namadoda amakhulu akwam, aphume umphefumlo phakathi komzi,  Xa abezifunela ukudla, ukuba abuyise imiphefumlo yawo.

20.verse: Khangela, Yehova, ngokuba ndibandezelekile; izibilini zam ziyabila; Intliziyo yam iphendukile phakathi kwam; ngokuba ndasuka ndaba ziinkani kuphela; Ngaphandle ikrele landihlutha abantwana, ngaphakathi kwakukufa kodwa.

21.verse: Bandivile ukuba ndiyancwina; ndathi, Andinamthuthuzeli;  Zonke iintshaba zam zibuvile ububi bam; zinemihlali, ngokuba oko kwenziwe nguwe. Uyayizisa imini oyimemileyo, ziya kuba njengam ke.

22.verse: Mabufike phambi kwakho bonke ububi bazo, Uziphathe njengoko wandiphatha ngako ngenxa yezikreqo zam zonke; Ngokuba kuninzi ukuncwina kwam, nentliziyo yam ityhafile.

1.verse: Yoo! Itheni na iNkosi yam ukuyisibekela kangaka ngomsindo wayo intombi enguZiyon? Isikhuphile ezulwini, yasikhahlela ehlabathini, isihombo sikaSirayeli, Ayasikhumbula isihlalo seenyawo zayo ngemini yomsindo wayo.

2.verse: INkosi yam iwaginyile, ayawaconga, onke amakriwa akwaYakobi;  Izigungxule ngokuphuphuma komsindo wayo iinqaba ezinkulu zentombi enguYuda; Yazizisa emhlabeni; Ibungcolisile ubukumkani nabathetheli babo.

3.verse: Izixakazile ngokuvutha komsindo wayo zonke iimpondo zikaSirayeli; Isibuyise umva isandla sayo sokunene ebusweni botshaba; Yatshisa kwaYakobi njengomlilo olenyayo, odlayo ngeenxa zonke.

4.verse: Isityedile isaphetha sayo njengotshaba; imise isandla sayo sokunene, saxelisa esombandezeli, Yazibulala zonke izinto ezinqwenelekayo emehlweni; Ententeni yentombi enguZiyon,  ibuphalazile ubushushu bayo njengomlilo.

5.verse: INkosi yam isuke yaba njengotshaba; imginyile uSirayeli,  Iziginyile zonke iingxande zayo ezinde, izonakalisile iinqaba zayo ezinkulu; Yandisa entombini enguYuda uncwino nokukhala.

6.verse: Iyichithile indawo yayo ebiyiweyo njengomyezo;  Iyitshabalalisile indawo yayo yentlangano; UYehova wenze walityalwa eZiyon umthendeleko nesabatha; Wabagiba ekubhavumeni komsindo wakhe ukumkani nombingeleli.

7.verse: INkosi yam isihlambele isibingelelo sayo, ithe nethe kuyo ingcwele yayo, Izivingcelele esandleni sotshaba iindonga zeengxande zayo ezinde; Baxokozela endlwini kaYehova njengemini yomthendeleko.

8.verse: UYehova ucinge ukonakalisa udonga lwentombi enguZiyon;  Wolule ulutya lokulinganisela, akasibuyisa isandla sakhe ekuginyeni; Wenza ungqameko lomsele lwaba nesijwili,  kwanodonga; zithokombisile kunye ezo zinto.

9.verse: Amasango ayo atshonile emhlabeni; uyitshabalalisile,  uyaphule imivalo yayo; Ukumkani wayo nabathetheli bayo basezintlangeni, akukho myalelo; Abaprofeti bayo abafumani mbono kuYehova.

10.verse: Ahleli emhlabeni ethe cwaka amadoda amakhulu entombi enguZiyon; Azigalele ngomhlaba entloko, abhinqe ezirhwexayo;  Uzithobele emhlabeni iintloko zawo umthinjana waseYerusalem.

11.verse: Amehlo am aphela ziinyembezi, ziyabila izibilini zam,  Isibindi sam siphalalele emhlabeni, ngenxa yokwaphuka kwentombi yabantu bakowethu, Ngokutyhafa kwabantwana, nabasemabeleni,  ezitratweni zomzi.

12.verse: Bamana ukuthi koonina, Iphi na ingqolowa newayini?  Ekutyhafeni kwabo njengabangxwelerhiweyo ezitratweni zomzi,  Ekuziphalazeni kwemiphefumlo yabo esifubeni sonina.

13.verse: Ndikungqinele, ngantoni na? Ndikufanekise nantoni na,  ntombi yaseYerusalem? Ndikulinganise nantoni na, ukuze ndikuthuthuzele, ntombindini iyintombi, inguZiyon? Ngokuba kukhulu ngangolwandle ukwaphuka kwakho; ngubani na onokukuphilisa?

14.verse: Abaprofeti bakho bakubonele imibono yento engento nejavujavu; Ababutyhila ubugwenxa bakho, ukuba kubuyiswe ukuthinjwa kwakho; Bakubonele imibono ezizihlabo ezingezizo,  nezokugxothwa.

15.verse: Babetha izandla ngawe bonke abadlula ngendlela; Benza umsondlo, bahlunguzele iintloko ngentombi enguYerusalem,  besithi, Ngulo mzi na, lo kuthiwa kuphela kwenzwakazi,  yimihlali yehlabathi lonke?

16.verse: Zonke iintshaba zakho zikwakhamisela umlomo; Zenza umsondlo, zitshixizela amazinyo; zithi, Siyiginyile; Inene,  yiyo le imini ebe siyithembile; siyifumene, siyibonile.

17.verse: Ukwenzile uYehova abekunkqangiyele; Ulizalisile ilizwi lakhe, abeliwisele umthetho kususela kwiimini zamandulo;  Ugungxule, akaconga; Wenze lwakuvuyelela utshaba lwakho,  Uphakamise uphondo lwababandezeli bakho.

18.verse: Intliziyo yabo ikhala eNkosini yam; Ludonga lwentombi enguZiyon, mazihle iinyembezi njengomlambo imini nobusuku; Musa ukuyeka, malungaphezi ukhozo lweliso lakho.

19.verse: Vuka, uhlahlambe ebusuku, ekuqalekeni kwemilindo; Yiphalaze njengamanzi intliziyo yakho ebusweni beNkosi; Ziphakamisele kuyo izandla zakho, ngenxa yomphefumlo wabantwana bakho,  Abatyhafileyo kukulamba ekujikeni kwezitrato zonke.

20.verse: Bona, Yehova, ukhangele, ngubani na lo wenjenje ukumphatha kakubi? Abafazi bangadla isiqhamo somzimba wabo na? Badle abantwana ababathantamisayo na? Angabulawelwa engcweleni yeNkosi na umbingeleli nomprofeti?

21.verse: Balele emhlabeni phandle oyinkwenkwe noyindoda enkulu;  Umthinjana wam namadodana am awile likrele; Ubulele ngemini yomsindo wakho, usikile, akwaconga.

22.verse: Ukumemile ngokwemini yomthendeleko ukunxunguphala kwam ngeenxa zonke, Akwabakho usindayo, usalayo, ngemini yomsindo kaYehova. Endibathantamisileyo ndabakhulisa, utshaba lwam lubagqibele.

1.verse: Ndim indoda ebone iintsizi, ngentonga yokuphuphuma komsindo wakhe.

3.verse: Ubuye wasiguqulela kum ndedwa isandla sakho imini yonke.

4.verse: Uyonakalisile inyama yam nolusu lwam; uwaphule amathambo am.

7.verse: Undibiyele ngeenxa zonke, andinakuphuma; uwenze aba nzima amakhamandela am obhedu.

8.verse: Noko ndikhalayo, ndizibikayo, uyawuvingcela umthandazo wam.

9.verse: Uzibiyele iindlela zam ngamatye aqingqiweyo, uzenze goso iingqushu zam.

11.verse: Uzityekisile iindlela zam, wandidlavula; undenze inxuwa.

12.verse: Usigobile isaphetha sakhe, wandimisa ndaba yitekeni yotolo lwakhe.

13.verse: Uzise ezintsweni zam iintolo zomphongolo wakhe.

14.verse: Ndisuke ndayintlekisa kubantu bonke bakowethu; ndiyingoma yabo imini yonke.

15.verse: Undihluthise ngeento ezikrakra, wandiseza ndahlutha umhlonyane.

16.verse: Uwaphule ngohlalu amazinyo am; undixinzelele phantsi eluthuthwini.

17.verse: Uwuhlambile umphefumlo wam, awaba naluxolo; ndiyilibele into elungileyo.

18.verse: Ndathi, aphelile amandla am, nokulinda kwam kuYehova.

19.verse: Zikhumbule iintsizi zam, nokutshutshiswa kwam, umhlonyane nenyongo.

20.verse: Umphefumlo wam uyazikhumbula unangoku ezo zinto,  usibekekile kum.

21.verse: Oko ndikunyamekele ngentliziyo: ngenxa yoko ndilindile.

22.verse: Kungeenceba zikaYehova le nto singagqityelwanga, ngokuba azipheli iimfesane zakhe.

23.verse: Zintsha imiso ngemiso; kukhulu ukuthembeka kwakhe.

24.verse: Isabelo sam nguYehova, utsho umphefumlo wam; ngenxa yoko ndilindele kuye.

25.verse: UYehova ulungile kwabathembele kuye, kumphefumlo omquqelayo.

26.verse: Kulungile ukuba umntu alulindele, ethe cwaka, usindiso lukaYehova.

27.verse: Kuyilungele indoda ukuba iyithwale idyokhwe kwasebutsheni bayo.

28.verse: Mayihlale yodwa ithe cwaka, xa iyithwalisiweyo.

29.verse: Mayiwubeke eluthulini umlomo wayo; kungabakho ithemba mhlawumbi.

30.verse: Mayisinikele isidlele sayo koyibethayo; mayihluthe yingcikivo.

31.verse: Ngokuba iNkosi yam ayiyi kumhlamba umntu ngonaphakade,

32.verse: Ngokuba naxa imhlisele usizi, noko yoba nemfesane ngokobuninzi benceba yayo.

33.verse: Ngokuba ayibacinezeli ngokuphuma entliziyweni yayo, ibenze babe nosizi oonyana babantu.

34.verse: Ekutyunyuzweni kwababanjiweyo bonke behlabathi phantsi kweenyawo;

35.verse: Ekulijikeni ityala lomfo phambi kobuso bOsenyangweni;

36.verse: Ekuphenulweni komntu ekubambaneni kwakhe nomnye: iNkosi yam ayiboni na?

37.verse: Ngubani na okhe wathetha, kwenzeka, iNkosi yam ingawisanga mthetho?

38.verse: Akuphumi okubi nokulungileyo emlonyeni wOsenyangweni na?

39.verse: Yini na ukuba umntu akhalaze ephilile? Umfo makakhalaze ngenxa yezono zakhe.

40.verse: Masiziphengulule iindlela zethu, sizigocagoce, sibuyele kuYehova.

41.verse: Masizinyuse iintliziyo zethu kunye nezandla zethu, sizise kuThixo emazulwini.

42.verse: Thina sikreqile saba neenkani; wena akuxolelanga.

44.verse: Uzigqubuthele ngelifu, ukuze ungaphumeli umthandazo wethu.

46.verse: Zisakhamisele umlomo wazo zonke iintshaba zethu.

47.verse: Kokwethu ukunkwantya, nomgongxo, nesibatha, nokutshabalala,  nokwaphuka.

48.verse: Iliso lam lihla imijelo yamanzi, ngenxa yokwaphuka kwentombi yabantu bakowethu.

51.verse: Iliso lam liyawubulala umphefumlo wam, ngenxa yeentombi zonke zomzi wakowethu.

52.verse: Zindizingele zandizingela njengentaka iintshaba zam ngelize.

53.verse: Zibubhangisile ubomi bam ngokundeyelisela emhadini,  zandigibisela ngamatye.

54.verse: Amanzi ahambe phezu kwentloko yam, ndathi, Ndinqanyulwe.

55.verse: Ndinqule igama lakho, Yehova, kongaphantsi umhadi.

56.verse: Izwi lam waliva; musa ukuyifihla indlebe yakho ekubefuzeni kwam, ekuzibikeni kwam.

57.verse: Wasondela ngemini yokukunqula kwam, wathi, Musa ukoyika.

58.verse: Uwathethile amatyala omphefumlo wam, Nkosi yam; ubukhulule ubomi bam ngokubumisela.

59.verse: Ukubonile, Yehova, ukuphenulwa kwam; ligwebe ityala lam.

60.verse: Uyibonile yonke impindezelo yabo, uzivile zonke iingcinga zabo ngam.

61.verse: Ukuvile ukungcikiva kwabo, Yehova, uzivile zonke iingcinga zabo ngam,

62.verse: Umlomo wabo basukela phezulu kum, nezicamango zabo ngam yonke imini.

63.verse: Ukuhlala kwabo nokusuka kwabo kubheke; ndiyingoma yabo.

64.verse: Babuyisele imbuyekezo, Yehova, ngokwezenzo zezandla zabo.

65.verse: Banike ubumfama bentliziyo; intshwabulo yakho mayibe kubo.

66.verse: Basukele ngomsindo, ubatshabalalise, bangabikho phantsi kwamazulu kaYehova.

1.verse: Yoo! Isuke igolide yaba mncumevu; isuke ecikizekileyo,  elungileyo, yaba yeyimbi; Asuke aphalazwa amatye engcwele ekujikeni kwezitrato zonke.

2.verse: AbeZiyon abanqabileyo, abamelwe yigolide engcwengiweyo, Yoo!  Babalelwa ekubeni yimiphanda yodongwe, umsebenzi wezandla zombumbi.

3.verse: Kanti neempungutye ziyalirhola ibele, zanyise amathole azo;  Ke yona intombi yabantu bakowethu isuke yaba sisijorha,  njengenciniba entlango.

4.verse: Ulwimi losebeleni lunamathela ekhuhlangubeni lakhe linxano;  Abantwana bacela isonka, akukho ubaphulelayo.

5.verse: Ababesidla ubuncwane baphanzile ezitratweni; Ababephathwa ngeengubo ezibomvu bawola amazala.

6.verse: Bukhulile ubugwenxa bentombi yakowethu ngaphezu kwesono seSodom, Yona yabhukuqwayo ngephanyazo, kungasiwanga sandla kuyo.

7.verse: Babeqaqambile ababalulekileyo bayo ngaphezu kwekhephu; baye bemhlophe ngaphezu kwamasi; Babeyingqombela imizimba ngaphezu kwekorale, isibili sabo besinjengesafire;

8.verse: Imbonakalo yabo imnyama ngaphezu kocolothi; Abanakaneki ezitratweni; ulusu lwabo lutshele emathanjeni abo; lomile,  lwanjengokhuni.

9.verse: Baneyhweba ababulewe ngekrele kunababulewe yindlala, Bona baphelayo ngokubulawa kukungabikho kweziqhamo zamasimi.

10.verse: Izandla zabafazi abanemfesane zipheke abantwanana babo,  Baba kukudla kwabo ekwaphukeni kwentombi yabantu bakowethu.

11.verse: Ubuphelelisile ubushushu bakhe uYehova, ukuphalazile ukuvutha komsindo wakhe; Wafaka umlilo eZiyon, wazitshisa iziseko zayo.

12.verse: Bebengenakukholwa ookumkani behlabathi, nabemi bonke belimiweyo, Ukuba ubengangenayo umbandezeli notshaba emasangweni aseYerusalem.

13.verse: Kungenxa yezono zabaprofeti bayo, nobugwenxa bababingeleli bayo, Abaphalaze igazi lamalungisa phakathi kwayo.

14.verse: Baphamzela beziimfama ezitratweni, bedyobhekile ligazi,  Bada abantu ababa nakuchukumisa nezambatho zabo.

15.verse: Sukani, nantso inqambi! Kwatshiwo ukumenyezwa kubo. Sukani,  sukani, musani ukuphatha! Bakusaba, baphamzela nalapho,  kwathiwa phakathi kweentlanga, Mabangaphindi baphambukele khona.

16.verse: Ubuso bukaYehova bubachithachithile, akasayi kubabheka;  Ubuso bababingeleli ababubhekanga, amadoda amakhulu abawababalanga.

17.verse: Thina, amehlo ethu ayaphela, ekhangele uncedo olungamampunge; Ekuboniseleni kwethu sibonisela uhlanga olungayi kusisindisa.

18.verse: Bazingela amanyathela ethu, ukuze singabi nakuhamba ezitratweni zethu; Kusondele ukuphela kwethu, izalisekile imihla yethu; ewe, kufikile ukuphela kwethu.

19.verse: Abasisukelayo banamendu ngaphezu kwamaxhalanga asezulwini;  Basisukela ezintabeni ngokushushu, basilalela entlango.

20.verse: Umoya wamathatha ethu, umthanjiswa kaYehova, ubanjisiwe emihadini yabo: Lowo besisithi, Siya kuhlala phantsi komthunzi wakhe ezintlangeni.

21.verse: Yiba nemihlali uvuye kambe, ntombi yakwaEdom, ihleliyo ezweni lakwaUtse; Iya kudlulela nakuwe indebe; uya kunxila,  uzihlube.

22.verse: Bugqityiwe ubugwenxa bakho, ntombi inguZiyon; Akayi kuphinda akufuduse; Uya kubuvelela ubugwenxa bakho, ntombi yakwaEdom. Uya kuzityhila izono zakho.

1.verse: Kukhumbule, Yehova, okusihleleyo; Bheka, uyibone ingcikivo yethu.

2.verse: Ilifa lethu lisuke lenziwa elabasemzini, Izindlu zethu zalunga kwabolunye uhlanga.

4.verse: Amanzi ethu siwasela ngesilivere; Iinkuni zethu ziza kuthi ngexabiso.

5.verse: Intshutshiso iphezu kwentamo yethu; Sidiniwe, asinakuphumla.

6.verse: Isandla sisinika amaYiputa, Nama-Asiriya, ukuba sihluthe sisonka.

7.verse: Oobawo bonile, abasekho; Thina sithwele ubugwenxa babo.

8.verse: Silawulwa ngabakhonzi; Akukho usiqhiwulayo ezandleni zabo.

9.verse: Isonka sethu sisizuza ngomphefumlo wethu usisichenge. Ngenxa yekrele lasentlango.

10.verse: Ulusu lwethu luyavutha njengeziko Ngenxa yolophu lwendlala.

11.verse: Badlwengule abafazi eZiyon, Iintombi emizini yakwaYuda.

12.verse: Baxhome abathetheli ngezandla; Ubuso bamadoda amakhulu abubekwa.

13.verse: Amadodana athwala amatye okusila, Amakhwenkwe akhubeka phantsi kweenkuni.

14.verse: Amadoda amakhulu aphezile ukuya esangweni; Amadodana,  ekubetheni uhadi.

15.verse: Iphelile imihlali yentliziyo yethu, Ukuqamba kwethu kujike kwaba kukumbambazela.

16.verse: Siwile isithsaba entlokweni yethu; Yeha ke thina! kuba sonile.

17.verse: Ngenxa yoko ityhafile intliziyo yethu; Ngenxa yezo zinto amnyama amehlo ethu;

18.verse: Ngenxa yentaba yaseZiyon, kuba ibharhile, Kuhamba iimpungutye phezu kwayo.

19.verse: Wena, Yehova, uhleli ngonaphakade; Itrone yakho ikwisizukulwana ngesizukulwana.

20.verse: Yini na ukuba usilibale ngonaphakade, Usilahle imihla emide?

21.verse: Sibuyisele kuwe, Yehova; sobuya; Hlaziya imihla yethu njengokwamandulo.

22.verse: Ungaba usicekise mpela na, Wanoburhalarhume kuthi ngokukhulukazi na?
